post_text: We have had numerous parents and staff members ask about the masks we purchased for students and staff regarding whether they could buy more. So glad you like them!I have contacted the company and we need to order a minimum of 500 to do a reorder. If you would be interested in ordering additional masks, please e-mail Kim Jauer with the number you would like to purchase at $7.00 each. If we have enough interest to meet our quota, we will send out order forms and do a re-order. At that time, you would select your size and pay for the mask. This is NOT a fundraiser. We are rounding up to the nearest dollar, so any extra funds would be put in the general fund to help with the costs for disinfectant supplies.

post_text: Hinton 4-12th grade students will return to on-site learning on Thursday, September 10th. Our data shows that the Plymouth County positivity rate has gone down for 3 consecutive days and is currently below 20%. The District absenteeism rate due to illness is well below our 10% concern level. Please continue to follow CDC guidelines.

post_text: Hinton Schools has a scheduled early dismissal on Friday, 9/4. The early dismissal for Prof Development next week will be moved to Friday, 9/11 for ALL grades to protect learning time while grades 4-12 are using the Hybrid Model. There will be no early dismissal on Wed, 9/9/20.

post_text: 7-12 students: You need to check your emails and Canvas by 8 am those 3 days you are at home, including Fridays. Attendance is required for each class, but how attendance is earned will be determined by each individual teacher. Fridays are still school days and teachers might require Zoom sessions.

post_text:
Parents of MS sports:
With the hybrid model in place for the time being, here is what MS sports will look like:

Practices: we will offer a bus that will pick up students on off days for practices and games. If your child rides the bus to school then we can pick them up. Should you need a ride contact Janet Held. Some have reached out and Janet Held will be contacting you for those arrangements.

Practice times:
Monday 2:40-4:30
Tuesday 2:40-4:30
Wednesday-2:40-3:20 ONLY THE KIDS IN SCHOOL WILL MEET.
Thursday 2:40-4:30
Friday-3:20-5:00 OPTIONAL...NO BUS PICKUP FOR PRACTICE THAT DAY
On game days a bus will come to pick kids up like practices.
PARENTS ARE TO PICK UP KIDS AFTER PRACTICES AND GAMES.

XC runners will work that out with Coach Hertenstein.

Should we go 100% online then all sports will be suspended.

Any questions contact Brian DeJong at the school.

Thank you~
